name: JollyHouse (BMS) Site
description: Built with React.js, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, and npm, JOLLYHOUSE manages apartments, users, payments, and announcements. It includes responsive design, user authentication, dedicated dashboards, and a robust admin panel.

name: StudyBuddy (Online Gorup Study) Site
description: StudyBuddy is a collaborative web app for managing assignments online. It features easy assignment creation, management, and peer grading, all within a user-friendly interface. Built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI.

name: ExploreAsia (Turist Management) Site
description: ExploreAsia is your go-to platform for discovering Asia's top tourist destinations and cultural experiences. Whether planning your next adventure or exploring from home, ExploreAsia provides detailed information, user-friendly features, and a vibrant community for sharing travel insights.
